inferred_surfaces: Pipeline package contract/bundle/CLI modules under pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/
Optional JSON Schema artefacts under pipeline/schemas/
Portal intent detail UI/read-model for per-task audit visibility
Governance prompts and close/audit scripts for evidence capture

tasks.notes: All planned task ids exist and are spelled correctly. Acceptance criteria for previously ambiguous tasks are deterministic and measurable (placeholders validate with exit_code=0; explicit numeric/range bounds; JSON Schema scope and draft/version requirements).

work_packages.notes: Generated work_packages cover all planned tasks (no unassigned tasks) and titles are clear.

close_gates.notes: Intent close gates and repository close process are consistent: audit:intent + guardrails + generate, plus close enforcement of per-task quality audit evidence for the run_id used at close.

guardrail_plan.notes: All in-scope requirement IDs are valid and declare guardrail/coverage mechanisms. The preflight prompt/requirement semantics now ensure PASS implies no required fixes.
